dict.string:
if [[ $(ps -xc|grep OmniWeb) ]]; then printf 'tell app "OmniWeb" 
 activate 
 reload first browser 
 end tell' | osascript elif [[ $(ps -xc|grep Safari) ]]; then printf 'tell app "Safari" 
 activate 
 do JavaScript "window.location.reload();" in first document 
 end tell' | osascript fi
